- $22.00","externalTicketingUrls":[],"multiEventCartable":true,"facebookEventId":"","facebookEventIdString":"","headliners":[{"id":1670311,"name":"Escape The Fate","startTime":null,"eventDescription":"Notorious Sin City rockers, Escape The Fate, resume their battle to the top in 2010 by unleashing a deluxe edition of their fan coveted breakout album This War Is Ours on April 27. 

Fans will get a virtual all access pass to rock's hottest band with new music and never-before-seen video footage. The two disc collection will include the standard album with two new unreleased tracks, "Bad Blood" and "Behind The Mask," an acoustic version of "Harder Than You Know" and an unreleased remix, "This War Is Mine," by Clown of Slipknot, as well as a DVD containing an explosive new music video for "This War Is Ours (Guillotine Part II)," fan favorite videos for "Something," "10 Miles Wide" and "The Flood," a world tour documentary and a behind the music feature. 

The deluxe edition of This War Is Ours is only the beginning for Escape The Fate in 2010, as the band has already begun writing music for their face-melting follow-up which is due out in the fall. 

Catch Escape The Fate at Extreme Thing, Bamboozle and Rock On The Range this spring!","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atjmbo.jpg","width":600,"height":399},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atjmbo1.jpg","width":600,"height":399},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":200},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":200},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":133},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":133},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-og.jpg","width":600,"height":399},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":67},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":67},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atxl.jpg","width":500,"height":333},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atxl1.jpg","width":500,"height":333},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atxxl.jpg","width":600,"height":399},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/23/10/25-atxxl1.jpg","width":600,"height":399}},"youtubeVideos":[{"videoId":"KAgHj2y_TDk","title":"Escape the Fate - NONPOINT, AN EXPLOSIVE AND ANGST DRIVEN HARD ROCK QUARTET FROM FORT LAUDERDALE, FL., HAVE HONED AND PERFECTED THESE SURVIVAL SKILLS. WITH OVER 10 YEARS OF SUCCESSES AND DOWNFALLS, NONPOINT RECENTLY SEPARATED FROM THEIR FOUNDING GUITARIST AND DEPARTED FROM THEIR RECORD LABEL AND MANAGEMENT. SEAMLESSLY ADJUSTING TO MAJOR CHANGE, NONPOINT IS MOVING FORWARD WITH NEW MUSIC, AN ADJUSTED ATTITUDE, AN INNOVATIVE STATE OF MIND AND FRESH SURROUNDINGS.

ONE OF THE NOTABLE BANDS TO BREAK THROUGH THE SOUTH FLORIDA METAL SCENE OF THE LATE 1990'S, NONPOINT WAS FORMED IN JANUARY OF 1998. THE CURRENT LINEUP BOASTS VOCALIST ELIAS, DRUMMER ROBB, BASSIST BASTARD AND GUITARIST ZACH.

KNOWN AS ONE OF THE MOST POWERFUL, CHAOTIC AND BRUTAL BANDS TO DESTROY A ROCK STAGE, NONPOINT HAS AN EXTENSIVE TOUR HISTORY AND A SOLID REPUTATION. THEY HAVE TOURED WITH MAJOR MUSIC HEAVYWEIGHTS SUCH AS MUDVAYNE, SEVENDUST, SKINDRED, DISTURBED, DROWNING POOL AND BUCKCHERRY.

THE BAND'S ACOUSTIC EP, "CUT THE CORD" WILL BE RELEASED ON DECEMBER 8, 2009. THEY ARE ALSO IN THE STUDIO RECORDING A NEW FULL LENGTH ALBUM WITH YEP! PRODUCTIONS' CHAD GRAY & GREG TRIBBETT (ALSO OF MUDVAYNE/HELLYEAH) WITH AN EXPECTED RELEASE DATE IN 2010.

NONPOINT IS AN ADAPTABLE, DETERMINED HARD ROCK BAND WHO WILL ALWAYS WIN THE GAME WE CALL "SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST." THEY ARE CURRENTLY MANAGED BY SPLIT MEDIA MANAGEMENT.","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atjmbo.jpg","width":600,"height":380},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atjmbo1.jpg","width":600,"height":380},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":190},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":190},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":127},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":127},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-og.jpg","width":600,"height":380},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":63},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":63},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atxl.jpg","width":500,"height":317},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atxl1.jpg","width":500,"height":317},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atxxl.jpg","width":600,"height":380},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/01/37/51/21-atxxl1.jpg","width":600,"height":380}},"youtubeVideos":[{"videoId":"dOO4VZeH4-g","title":"Nonpoint-Bullet With A Name","embedCodeIframe":"<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="425" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dOO4VZeH4-g" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>"},{"videoId":"t1Dn9maSk_8","title":"Nonpoint - Alive and Kicking Video","embedCodeIframe":"<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="425" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CpZafqKl1g8" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>"}],"embedAudio":"","embedVideo":"<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="425" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dOO4VZeH4-g" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>","urlAudio":"","urlPurchaseMusic":"","urlOfficialWebsite":"http://www.nonpoint.com","urlMySpace":"http://www.myspace.com/nonpoint","urlFacebook":"http://www.facebook.com/nonpointworld#!/nonpointworld?sk=wall","urlTwitter":"http://twitter.com/nonpoint","twitterScreenName":"nonpoint"}],"supports":[{"id":1670331,"name":"Get Scared","startTime":null,"eventDescription":"We started the band with the motive to not be another mundane closed minded group of musicians. We were all sick of the regurgitated music that was being put out, and unhappy with how Intolerant the music scene had become in our hometown. This gave us the passion to create music that not only went against everything in our hometown scene, but also to make music that truly made us feel whole. The meaning behind the name "Get Scared" is to not hold back in life.
